resourceTemplates.name: replicate-search-query
resourceTemplates.title: Search models and collections
resourceTemplates.description: Searches public models, collections and documentation on Replicate based on the given query. The limit parameter defines the maximum number of results (1–50).

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-model-details
resourceTemplates.title: Model details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific model owned by the given account, including input and output schemas for the latest version.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-model-readme
resourceTemplates.title: Model readme
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the model’s README content in Markdown format, including usage notes and author information.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-model-examples
resourceTemplates.title: Model examples
resourceTemplates.description: Lists example predictions created by the model author to demonstrate the model’s capabilities.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-model-versions
resourceTemplates.title: Model versions
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all available versions of the specified model, sorted by most recent first.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-model-version-details
resourceTemplates.title: Model version details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves detailed metadata and OpenAPI schema for a specific model version.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-prediction-details
resourceTemplates.title: Prediction details
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches the current status, logs, and output of a prediction by its unique ID.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-collection-details
resourceTemplates.title: Collection details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves metadata and a list of models within the specified collection, such as super-resolution or image-restoration.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-deployment-details
resourceTemplates.title: Deployment details
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches configuration and current release information for a given deployment owned by an organization or user.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-training-details
resourceTemplates.title: Training details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the current state, logs, metrics, and outputs for a specific training run.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-file-details
resourceTemplates.title: File details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves metadata and information about an uploaded file, including size and content type.

resourceTemplates.name: replicate-file-download
resourceTemplates.title: File download link
resourceTemplates.description: Downloads a file from Replicate using owner, expiry timestamp, and signed URL parameters.
